item.title: Best tools to start with Social Media Marketing - 2011 re-cap (where are they now)
item.description: [typography font=”Special Elite” size=”25″ size_format=”px”]If you're just getting started with Social Media marketing then you need at least 1 web based tool to help you.

item.title: Thinkup - Social Media Monitoring (made easier) tools
item.description: Thinkup - If you want to run your own social media monitoring tool then try this.

item.title: The social media bible [book review]
item.description: Social Media Marketing is a growing body of knowledge and everything about ‘it’ is in a state of flux and changing rapidly, It’s unfair to call anything a bible.
